Uses of Package
hume

Classes in hume used by hume
Agent
          The Agent class defines the agent's properties and their behaviour.
Agent.Factory
          The agent factory interface contains only the method create to create new agents.
DoubleSidedMatching
          Matching algorithm for "double sided" matching.
DoubleSidedMatching.Accounting
          Provides services for the self-monitoring of the DoubleSidedMatching- Algroithm.
ILearning
          Interface for classes that implement a learning algorithm.
ILearningObsolete
          Interface for the learning algorithm that agents use to update the variables that control their behaviour, i.e. the variables localTrustworthiness, marketTrustworthiness, localTrust, maketTrust.
IOutputServices
           
IPlotter
           
ISimulation
           
IView
           
Matching
          Class Matching is an abstract class that encapsulates the matching algorithm.
MatchingView
           
MatrixMatching.MatchingStates
          Objects of the local class AgentState store additional information about agents that is determined before the agents are matches.
Network
          The Network class is an abstract class for networks.
PartitionNetwork
          Class PartitionNetwork defines a partition network topology, where the world is a partition of neighborhods of agents.
PartitionNetworkView
          PartitionNetworkView displays a partition network on the screen
Simulation
          The Simulation runs and controls the whole simulation.
SimulationDefinition
          The SimulationDefinition class contains all the information that is required to set up a specific simulation.
StatisticsView
           
TrustGame
